form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/28/2023 Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R079.7 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN GISTRATION (Show the exact spelling of name as it appears on your alien reg- Mail or take to: istration receipt card, and number of your card. If you did not IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE register, so state.) Name Yen Mei-Ling Tuan gep No. A10 179 278 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION (See INSTRUCTIONS, page 5. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT.)
